name: Office Man (UnderdogTagTeam)
description:
You play as Mr. Ofitzman, and your goal is to get a promotion in five days at your firm. Survive the perils of the corporate world, avoid social interactions, and explore the absurd open world of Office Man. 

Features: 

- Survival Mechanics

- Tactical Combat

- RPG Character Progression

- Open World Exploration

- Original Soundtrack

- Professional Narrator

- ~6 hours of Gameplay

- Kafkaesque Circular Reasoning

- Corporate Small Talk

Development Note:

The idea is to release this game with a good amount of features, but not spending time expanding them even more.  If we feel the success of the game is substantial, we have more features and content planned already, so go out and support this budding team and let us know every issue you run into. We're trying to release as complete and as stable a game as possible but there's only so much time we can spend playing our beautiful product, when there's polishing to be done! All revenue is going directly into funding the hardware of this studio so we can expand our scope into some truly amazing games. Until then, here's a small nugget of our passion towards gaming that is by no means perfect, but is made with every ounce of effort and love that we have.
